Package org.apache.cocoon.transformation

Class Summary
CharacterEventConcatenatorTransformer  
CInitiateTransformer Process another request in a new thread, continuing the current request.
CookieTransformer A Cocoon transformer for handling cookies.
HTMLCharacterTransformer According to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML_decimal_character_rendering]: HTML forbids the use of the characters with Universal Character Set/Unicode code points * 0000 to 0008 * 0011 to 0012 * 0014 to 0031 * 0127 * 0128 to 0159 (see [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows-1252]) * 55296 to 57343 These characters are not even allowed by reference.
HtmlMailTransformer This Transformer is capable of sending emails with inline images, but without attachments.
LOWProfilerTransformer  
MessageLoggerTransformer  
MultiFragmentTraxTransformer Apply a TrAX transformer to selected parts of the input document.
NamespaceStripperTransformer  
NoOpTransformer  
PipelineSlowdownTransformer  
ResponseHeaderTransformer Set HTTP response headers from an XML document.
SAXEventTransformer  
SendMailTransformer The SendMailTransformer send mails using SMTP including attachments with the specific parameters read from a configuration-file and delivers furthermore a report, where a state to each sent mail can bee seen.
SparqlTransformer * @cocoon.sitemap.component.documentation This transformer triggers for the element query in the namespace "http://apache.org/cocoon/sparql/1.0".
StreamingSourceWritingTransformer  
StripNameSpacesTransformer  
YetAnotherSourceWritingTransformer
